com.verygoodsecurity.vgscollect.widget

Class VGSTextInputLayout

  • TextInputFieldLayout
    • com.verygoodsecurity.vgscollect.widget.VGSTextInputLayout

  • public class VGSTextInputLayout
extends TextInputFieldLayout

    Material component which wraps an VGS field to show a floating label when the hint is hidden due to user inputting text.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  VGSTextInputLayout.Companion 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static VGSTextInputLayout.Companion Companion 
      static int END_ICON_CLEAR_TEXT
      The TextInputLayout will show a clear text button while there is input in the EditText. Clicking it will clear out the text and hide the icon.
      static int END_ICON_CUSTOM
      The TextInputLayout will show a custom icon specified by the user.
      static int END_ICON_NONE
      Default for the TextInputLayout. It will not display an end icon.
      static int END_ICON_PASSWORD_TOGGLE
      The TextInputLayout will show a password toggle button if its EditText displays a password. When this end icon is clicked, the password is shown as plain-text if it was disguised, or vice-versa.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Material component which wraps an VGS field to show a floating label when the hint is hidden due to user inputting text.
      VGSTextInputLayout(android.content.Context context, android.util.AttributeSet attrs)
      Material component which wraps an VGS field to show a floating label when the hint is hidden due to user inputting text.
      VGSTextInputLayout(android.content.Context context)
      Material component which wraps an VGS field to show a floating label when the hint is hidden due to user inputting text.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class com.verygoodsecurity.vgscollect.view.material.TextInputFieldLayout

        addOnAttachStateChangeListener, addView, addView, addView, addView, addView, attachViewToParent, getEndIconMode, getHint, getPaddingBottom, getPaddingEnd, getPaddingLeft, getPaddingRight, getPaddingStart, getPaddingTop, onAttachedToWindow, setBoxBackgroundColor, setBoxBackgroundMode, setBoxCornerRadius, setBoxStrokeColor, setCounterEnabled, setCounterMaxLength, setEndIconDrawable, setEndIconDrawableTintList, setEndIconMode, setEndIconOnClickListener, setError, setError, setHint, setHint, setHintAnimationEnabled, setHintEnabled, setPadding, setPasswordToggleEnabled, setPasswordVisibilityToggleDrawable, setPasswordVisibilityToggleTintList, setStartIconDrawable, setStartIconDrawableTintList, setStartIconOnClickListener

    • Field Detail

      • END_ICON_CUSTOM

        public static int END_ICON_CUSTOM

        The TextInputLayout will show a custom icon specified by the user.

      • END_ICON_NONE

        public static int END_ICON_NONE

        Default for the TextInputLayout. It will not display an end icon.

        See Also:
        TextInputFieldLayout.setEndIconMode, TextInputFieldLayout.getEndIconMode

      • END_ICON_PASSWORD_TOGGLE

        public static int END_ICON_PASSWORD_TOGGLE

        The TextInputLayout will show a password toggle button if its EditText displays a password. When this end icon is clicked, the password is shown as plain-text if it was disguised, or vice-versa.

        See Also:
        TextInputFieldLayout.setEndIconMode, TextInputFieldLayout.getEndIconMode

      • END_ICON_CLEAR_TEXT

        public static int END_ICON_CLEAR_TEXT

        The TextInputLayout will show a clear text button while there is input in the EditText. Clicking it will clear out the text and hide the icon.

        See Also:
        TextInputFieldLayout.setEndIconMode, TextInputFieldLayout.getEndIconMode

      • Companion

        public static VGSTextInputLayout.Companion Companion
